TermDefinition.DefinitionText: An inherited form of medullary thyroid cancer (cancer that forms in the cells of the thyroid that make the hormone calcitonin).

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "familial medullary thyroid cancer"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "carcinoma de tiroides medular familiar"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Forma heredada de cáncer medular de tiroides (cáncer que se forma en las células de la tiroides que elaboran la hormona calcitonina).
